```{r}
library(leaflet)

m <- leaflet()
m <- addTiles(m)
m <- addMarkers(m, lng=-73.952533, lat=40.631021, popup="CUNY Brooklyn College")
m


```


```{r}
library(leaflet)

m <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng=-73.952533, lat=40.631021, popup="CUNY Brooklyn College")
m 

```
